title: hand painted script
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415032451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sated%20Magazine_4979.jpg)

Would love to know where I can find a font like this - hand painted and not totally illegible. Thanks in advance!
author: Meloncally

comments.content: Looks like a manually backslanted [P22 Cezanne](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415032451/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/cezanne/) by Michael Want and James Grieshaber.
